amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 8058 of the bill which prohibits funds from being used to repair or maintain military family housing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 113-170 to strike section 8058.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. O'Rourke.
